page.title: 16TRADE: KENNELS IN WESTFIELD
page.content: All charges must be paid before the pet leaves. These premises are insured so that in the unlikely event of an accident or illness which necessitates the attention of a vet you will be covered up to the sum of Â£100. A charge of 10p a day or 50p a week in the case of cats and 10p a day or 75p a week in the case of dogs will be made to cover the cost of insurance. The charge is in addition to the daily rate. {TARIFS {CATS -------------Â£1.00 {DOGS {TOY -------------Â£1.40 {SMALL ------------Â£1.60 {MEDIUM------------Â£1.80 {LARGE-------------Â£2.00 {EX LARGE----------Â£2.20 {They accept owners bringing bedding as {it makes the pets more settled.
